title: New: JAWS – Need Me
body:
Australia again coming out on top with it’s current crop of electronic music, this time in the form of Sydney producer **JAWS**.

His debut offering, _Need Me_, is part dance floor ready trip-hop, part chilled-out Cashmere Cat vibes. With the summer months gradually approaching, you’d be well advised to get this on your playlist now. Check out Need Me below.

His debut offering, Need Me, is part dance floor ready trip-hop, part chilled-out Cashmere Cat vibes. With the summer months gradually approaching, you’d be well advised to get this on your playlist now. \[…\]
